Posts.Content: Aug 28, 2008 04:49AM spinelli1 wrote: I'm so glad I jumped on this page...I had my excision about 2 months ago and my scar has been sensitive on an off since then....since the summer has heated up and I'm wearing tank tops to bed it seems even more sensitive to touch.  Called my surgeon 4 times w/no call back...do not like this guy at all... glad some of you also still have sensitivity issues too.
Posts.Title: Pain after a lumpectomy/re-excision? oldlady mamakaren
